Name: mu tou hui
Botanical: Patrinia rupestris sp. scabra (糙葉敗醬)
Common: English: Diversifolious patrinia root; root of scabrous patrinia; scabrous patrinia root

Geography: Mainly produced in Shanxi, Henan, Hebei, Guangxi (China) [2]
Distributed in Liaoning, Hebei, Shanxi, Henan, Shaanxi, Gansu, Guangxi (China) [1]
Maladies Treated: Vaginal bleeding not during menses (崩漏)
Dosage: Oral: decoction 9–15 g. External application: appropriate amount; smash and apply.
Samples of Formulae: Vaginal bleeding and vaginal discharge: Use a handful of mu tou hui (diversifolious patrinia root), a pinch of new Hong Hua (safflower), and water and rice wine, half of each. Cook and simmer down to 70%. Drink before bedtime while warm. If the illness is recent, use one dose; if chronic, use three doses. Source: 《董炳集驗方》 [2]
References: [1] Zhong Yao Da Ci Dian 中藥大辭典
[2] Zhong Hua Ben Cao 中華本草

[1]主產山西、河南、河北、廣西等地。[2]分佈於遼寧、河北、山西、河南、陝西、甘肅、廣西等地[1]Properties(characteristics)﹕性味﹕ bitter, slightly sour, slightly astringent, cool.苦, 微酸澀, 涼   Channels (meridians) entered: 歸經﹕heart, liver.心, 肝.Medical functions:藥理﹕ anti cancersedative effect抗癌鎮靜Actions & Indications:主治﹕For uterine erosion, early cervical cancer, vaginal discharge,  vaginal bleeding not during menses, malaria.用於子宮糜爛，早期宮頸癌，白帶，崩漏，瘧疾。Chemical ingredients: [2]化學成份﹕【2】The roots and stems of Patrinia rupestris sp. scabra contain evaporating oil, among them:糙葉敗醬 根及根莖含揮發油，其中主成分有：β-caryophylleneβ-丁香烯β-caryophylleneβ-丁香烯α-humuleneα-葎草烯decahydro-4,8,8-trimethyl-9-methylene-1,4-methanoazulene十氫-4，8，8-三甲基-9-亞甲基-1，4-亞甲基薁3,7,11-trimethyl-1,3,6,10-dodecatetraene3，7，11-三甲基-1，3，6，10-十二碳四烯ξ-cadinolξ-蓽澄茄醇β-selineneβ-芹子烯 另據報道，油中主成分還有：α-gurjunene, β-gurjuneneα-和β-古芸烯n-hexadecane正十六烷The roots of Patrinia heterophylla Bunge contain 0.63% of evaporating oil, among them:異葉敗醬 根含揮發油0.63%，主成分為:isovaleric acid異戊酸sesquiterpene倍半萜烯類sesquiterpenoid 倍半萜化合物sesquiterpene alcohol倍半萜醇類aldehyde醛ketone酮alcohol醇monoterpene單萜烯類Acording another report, the evaporating oil contains:另據報道揮發油中含α-pinene and  β-pineneα和β-蒎烯limolene檸檬烯γ-elemene, and ξ- elemeneγ-和ξ-欖香烯borneol龍腦α-terpineol, β-terpineolα和β-松油醇β-maalieneβ-橄欖烯β-guaieneβ-愈創木烯ξ-cadineneξ-蓽澄茄烯Dosage:用 量﹕oral: in decoction 9 to 15 g.External application: appropriate amount. Smash and apply.內服：煎湯，9-15g。外用：適量，搗敷。Samples of formulae:處方舉 例﹕Vaginal bleeding, vaginal discharge: use a handful of mu tou hui, a pinch of new hong hua and water and rice wine, half of each. Cook and simmer down to 70%. Drink before bed time. Use while warm. If sickness is new use one dose. If it is chronic, use 3 doses. [2]崩中， 赤白帶下： 墓頭回一把，酒水各半盞，新紅花一捻，煎七分，臥時溫服。 日近者一服，久則三服。《董炳集驗方》Modern Research:現代研究﹕ Toxicity & Cautions:毒素與禁忌﹕[1]  Zhong Yao Da Ci Dian 中藥大辭典[2] Zhong Hua Ben Cao 中華本草Problems with website? Maladies Treated: postpartum dizziness due to blood loss (產後血暈)
food poisoning from fish, meat, or vegetables (魚肉菜毒)
carbuncle and swollen sores (癰腫瘡毒)
Medical Function: disperses blood stasis and reduces accumulations (散淤消積)
Dosage:
Oral: 10–30 ml; in decoction, or soaking, or mix with other food items.
External use: appropriate amount; rinsing in the mouth, or mix with other herb and apply, or use in steaming or washing.
Samples of Formulae:
For abdominal masses/tumor (治瘕症): Bie Jia (turtle shell) 鱉甲, He Zi peel (Chebula fruit peel) 訶子皮, Gan Jiang (dried ginger) 乾薑. Equal amounts of each. Grind into powder. Mix with starch glue made with vinegar. Make into pills, sizes like soy beans. Take orally 30 pills each time with drinking water during empty stomach. Source: Yi Xue Ru Men (醫學入門), formula name: Cu Bie Wan (醋鱉丸).
Fish bone lodged in throat（魚骨梗喉嚨）.
Contraindications: Use with care if dampness is heavy, the body is weak and muscles are in atrophy, or spastic, or during the early stage of cold or influenza.
Research:
Insecticidal effect (in vitro): After exposure of protoscolex to 0.125%–0.25% acetic acid, within 2–3 minutes the skin started to blister, producing pricks, skin separating, dissolution, the body became dark, calcium granules reduced, and other morphological changes. In 5–10 minutes, 100% were killed. Protoscolex treated with acetic acid for 10 minutes and then used for intraperitoneal inoculation to mice did not develop into hydatid disease. [1]
Antibacterial and antiviral effect: Acetic acid has good bacteriostatic and bactericidal effects on Streptococcus (甲型鏈球菌), Branhamella (Neisseria) catarrhalis (卡他球菌), Streptococcus pneumoniae (肺炎鏈球菌), Staphylococcus (白色葡萄球菌), influenza virus (流感病毒), and other pathogens. [1]
Notes:
Protoscolex is the larval form of the tapeworm parasite of the genus Echinococcus. Hydatid is a cyst due to infection by larvae of some species of the tapeworm Echinococcus.
The chemical ingredients list is cited from [2].
References: [1] Zhong Hua Ben Cao 中華本草
[2] Zhong Yao Da Ci Dian 中藥大辭典

In 5-10 minutes 100% were killed. Using protoscolex that had been treated with acetic acid for 10 minutes to intraperitoneal inoculate to mice and did not develop into hydatid disease.2. antibacterial, antiviral effect: acetic acid have a good bacteriostatic and bactericidal effect on Streptococcus, Branhamella (Neisseria) catarrhalis, Streptococcus pneumoniae, Staphylococcus, influenza virus and other pathogens.1.殺虫作用 體外試驗，0.125%-0.25%乙酸與原頭蚴接觸後可在2-3 分鐘內出 現皮層起泡，起刺，皮層分離，溶解及虫體發暗，鈣粒減少等形態結構變化。5-10 分鐘內可達到100%殺死原頭蚴的效果。原頭蚴經藥液處理10 分鐘後 ，給小鼠腹腔接種，均未發育成棘球坳。2.抗菌、抗病毒作用 乙酸對甲型鏈球菌、卡他球菌、肺炎鏈球菌、白色葡萄球菌、流感病毒等 致病菌，有很好的抑菌和殺菌作用。Actions & Indications:主治﹕getting rid of blood stasis and improving digestion. rid of roundworms; detoxification. For treatment of postpartum dizziness; lumps in abdomen; vomiting; epistaxis; blood in stool; parasitic abdominal pain; food poisoning; carbuncle and swollen sores散淤消 積；止血；安蛔；解毒。主產後血暈；症瘕積聚；吐血；衄血；便血；虫積腹痛；魚肉菜毒；癰腫瘡毒Chemical ingredients: [2]化學成份﹕【2】 Vinegar contains:醋含；acetic acid, 3%-5%乙酸 3%-5%higher alcohol高級醇類acetoin3-羥基丁酮dihydroxyacetone二羥基丙酮tyrosol酪醇acetaldehyde乙醛formaldehyde甲醛acetal乙縮醛succinic acid琥珀酸oxalic acid草酸sorbose山梨糖Click here to see cider vinegar chemical ingredients in USDA site. Dosage:用 量﹕oral: 10 - 30 ml. in decoction, or soaking or mix with other food items.external use: appropriate amount. Rinsing in the mouth, or mix with other herb and apply, or use in steaming or washing.內服：煎湯，10-30 毫升；或浸漬；或拌制。外用：適量，含漱；或調藥敷；或熏蒸；或浸洗。Samples of formulae:處方舉 例﹕For treatment of tumor：bi jie, he zi peel, gan jiang. Equal amount of each. Grind into powder. Mix with starch glue made with vinegar. Make into pills, sizes like soy beans. Take orally 30 pills each time with drinking water during empty stomachFish bone lodged in throat 治 瘕症：鱉 甲、訶 子皮、乾 薑各等分。為末，醋糊丸，梧子大，每服三十丸，空心白湯下。（《醫學入門》 醋鱉丸）魚骨梗喉嚨Modern Research:現代研究﹕ Toxicity & Cautions:毒素與禁忌﹕Use with care if dampness is heavy, the body is weak and muscles are in atrophy, or spastic, or during the early stage of cold or influenza.[2]脾胃濕 重， 身體痿弱，肌肉萎縮、筋脈攣 或外感初起者慎服。[2]Note:Protoscolex is the larval form of the tapeworm parasite of the genus Echinococcus. Hydatid is a cyst due to infection by larvae of some species of the tapeworm Echinococcus. [1] Zhong Hua Ben Cao   中華本草[2] Zhong Yao Da Ci Dian 中藥大 辭典 Problems with website? Name: huang qi
Other name: bei qi (Northern huang qi; 北芪)
huang qi (written differently in Chinese: 黃芪)

Medical Function: Large dosage (above 35 grams) can lower blood pressure with vasodilation effect
Small dosage (within 15 grams) can increase blood pressure
Promotes pus discharge and tissue regeneration
Dosage: 6–10 g per day. For use in hypertension, the dosage usually is above 30 g. Small dosage can have hypertensive effect.
Samples of Formulae:
Bu Zhong Yi Qi Tang 補中益氣湯
Shi Quan Da Bu Tang 十全大補湯
Gui Pi Tang 歸脾湯
Yu Ping Feng San 玉屏風散
Contraindications:
There are many varieties of astragalus; some are toxic. The varieties used in Chinese herbal medicine are relatively safe, but in rare cases it might cause skin rash, especially in patients with spleen deficiency (pixu) and serious kidney yang deficiency (shenyangxu).

Do not use for liver yang ascending type of hypertension. It can be used for qi-deficient and blood-deficient types of hypertension.

As a strong tonic that warms and raises yang, it is not suitable in acute infections such as cold or flu, boils, skin ulcers, yin deficiency with fever, and digestive tract infection. Traditional cautions include exterior excess with strong pathogenic factor (biao shi), heat-toxin sores and swellings, yin deficiency with body heat, accumulation and stagnation with focal distention (ji zhi pi man), and liver yang rising.
Research: Astragaloside IV possesses potent anti-HBV activity. [1]
Notes:
Quality assessment: Usually the smaller pieces are better than the large, wider pieces. Larger pieces can be reconstituted from small pieces or made from smaller roots soaked in water and mechanically pressed into wider pieces; during this process, effective ingredients may leach into the water.

Wild roots are the best. Typically, wild roots are not very large and have more distinctive fibers.

Astramenbrangenin (obtained after oxidization of astralagus menbranaceus saponin by Smith) [2]

Northern huang qi is considered to be better; but usually the herb stores do not differentiate them.處方時黃芪常寫作為北芪， 意思是�北方産的黃芪�。一般認為北芪質量較好。但通常是藥店不加以區別。huang qi (it is written differently in Chinese)黃芪dai shen戴椹shu zhi蜀脂mian huang qi綿黃耆du gen獨根er ren tai二人抬Common Name:英文名：Astragalus rootDistribution:產地：Mainly produced in Shanxi, heilongjiang provinces and Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region, also produce in jilin, Gansu, hebei, Shaanxi and northeastern part of China.主產於山西，黑龍江， 內蒙。吉林，甘肅，陜西，東北亦有生產。Properties (characteristics)：性味：tastes slightly sweet and has almost no smell微甘，幾乎沒有氣味。Channels (meridians) entered:歸經：lung and spleen.肺，脾。Actions & Indications:主治 ：In qixu (qi deficient) , pixu (spleen deficient) and yangxu (yang deficient),  weakness and fatigue, numbness of limb, morbidity after stroke, sweating, promoting pus discharge and tissue regeneration. Promotes diuresis to reduce edema. Treatment of diabetes. Treatment of xinyangxu (heart yang deficient)  and shenyangxu.用於氣 虛， 脾虛，陽 虛，心 陽虛， 腎陽虛，體 弱疲倦，肢體麻木，中風後遺癥，自汗，糖尿病。可幫助排膿，生肌。利尿消腫。Medical Function:藥理： large dosage of above 35 grams can lower blood pressure with vaso-dilation effectsmall dosage within 15 grams can increase blood pressure prolonging diuretic effect lessening proteinuria improving endurance protecting liver function regulate blood sugarastragaloside IV possesses potent anti-HBV activity.[1] 大剤量，35克以 上，能降血壓，有擴張血管作用小剤量，15克以 內，有生壓作用延長利尿作用減輕蛋白尿增進耐力保護肝臟功能調整血糖黃芪皂甙IV具 有對抗HBV活性強效。[1]Chemical ingredients:化學成分：1. Astralagus menbranaceus, (Fisch.) Beg.astragaloside I, astragaloside II, daucosterol, beta-sitosterol, palmitic acid, sucrose [1]. Astragalus saponin A,B,C.  Astramenbrangenin was obtained after oxidization of astralagus menbranaceus saponinby Smith. [2].2',4'-dihydroxy-5, 6-dimethoxyisof lavane, kumatakenin, choline, betaine, folic acid [3,4], calyxosin, formononetin, cycloastragenol, astragaloside I,II,III,IV [5], and antibacterial ingredient, L-3-hydroxy-9-methoxpterocarpan[6].2. Astragalus mongholicus (Beg) Hsiao(more to upload)Dosage per day:每日用量：6-10 g. For use in hypertension, the dosage usually is above 30 g. Small dosage and can have hypertensive effect.6～10 克。治 療高血壓時，其用量一般在30克 以上。剤量小有生壓作用。Samples of formulae:Bu Zhong Yi Qi Tang 補中益氣湯﹐Shi Quan Da Bu Tang 十全大補湯,Gui Pi Tang 歸脾 湯,Yu Ping Feng San, 玉屏風散Modern Research:現代研究：(more to upload)Quality：質量：Usually the smaller pieces are better than the large, wider pieces.The larger pieces can be either reconstituted from the little pieces or made from the smaller roots that has been soaked in water and mechanically pressed into wider pieces. In the process, the effective ingredients may leach out into the water.The wild roots are the best. Usually the wild roots are not as large and the fibers are more distinctive一般較小片比寬大片較好。較大片的可能是用小片壓成的，或用較小的根浸泡在水中，浸軟後，用機器壓成的。在 這個過程中，有效成分可能浸出到水中。 野生的根是最好的。通常情況下，野生的根一般是不很大，而且纖維明顯。Cautions and Contra-indications:禁忌：There are many varieties of astragalus. Some are toxic. The varieties used in Chinese herbal medicine is relatively safe but in rare cases it might cause skin rash, especially in patients with pixu (spleen deficient)   and serious shenyangxu (kidney yang deficient) conditions.It cannot be used in liver yang ascending type of hypertension but can be use in qi deficient and blood deficient type of hypertension.Huang qi is a strong tonic and can raise the function of the body, thus it is not suitable to use in acute infections, like cold or flu,  boils, skin ulcers, yin deficient with fever, digestive tract infection.不能用於 肝陽上亢所引起的高血壓。但可以用於氣 虛與血虛型 的血壓高。而由於黃耆溫補升陽之力甚強。不宜用於是表實邪盛、熱毒瘡瘍、 陰虛身熱、積滯痞滿 、肝陽上亢者。黃芪有多種。有些有毒 。 中藥用的種類是相當安全的，但在很少情形下曾有發生皮疹, 尤其是脾 虛與 腎陽虛患 者。 [1] Biol Pharm Bull 32(1):132-5 (2009), PMID 19122295 If you need more information in a hurry, you can email our research librarian.Search this siteProblems with website? Geography: China (cultivated in gardens throughout the country; now in most parts of China)
Maladies Treated: Flowers: vomiting or burping with undigested food
Flowers: tongue with oily, dirty fur (greasy tongue coating)
Flowers: Spleen and Stomach damp-turbidity (脾胃濕濁)
Flowers: chest and epigastric fullness/oppression (胸脘滿悶)
Dosage:
Flowers: internal decoction 3–5 g; external use: appropriate amount.
Root: 1.5–9 g in pills or powder.
Contraindications:
The bulb and the flowers have been known to cause dermatitis in sensitive people; its leaves and bulbs may cause skin allergy. Up to 5 bulbs a day can be eaten without ill effect. [1]
Overconsumption can cause diarrhea. [1]
Research: Alcohol extract of leaves and stems possesses an inhibiting effect on Bacillus cereus and Bacillus mycoides.

Perianth (flower perianth): quercetin-3-O-β-gentiobioside-7-O-β-glucuronide (槲皮素-3-O-β-D-龍膽二糖甙-7-O-β-葡萄糖醛酸甙)
quercetin-3-O-β-rutinoside-7-O-β-glucuronide (槲皮素-3-O-β-芸香糖甙-7-O-β-葡萄糖醛酸甙)
quercetin-3-O-β-glucoside-7-O-β-glucuronide (槲皮素-3-O-β-葡萄糖甙-7-O-β-葡萄糖醛酸甙)
kaempferol-3-O-β-gentiobioside-7-O-β-glucuronide (山柰酚-3-O-β-龍膽二糖甙-7-O-β-葡萄糖醛酸甙)
kaempferol-3-O-β-rutinoside-7-O-β-glucuronide (山柰酚-3-O-β-芸香糖甙-7-O-β-葡萄糖醛酸甙)
kaempferol-3-O-β-glucoside-7-O-β-glucuronide (山柰酚-3-O-β-葡萄糖甙-7-O-β-葡萄糖醛酸甙)
Root (rhizome): fatty acids (主要為 octadecadienoic acid/十八碳二烯酸)
sterols (主要為 sitosterol/谷甾醇, campesterol/菜油甾醇)
Leaves: abscisic acid methyl ester (脫落酸甲酯)

References: [1] Frohne. D. and Pf鄚der. J. A Colour Atlas of Poisonous Plants. Wolfe 1984 ISBN 0723408394

C.Pron. in Japanese:日語發音﹕ukonkuPron. in Korean:韓語發音﹕ Pron. in Cantonese::粵音﹕wat1 gam1 heong1Other Names:別名﹕yu xiang 鬱香，hong lan hua 紅藍花，zi shu xiang 紫述香。Common Name:英文名﹕tulipsDistribution:產地﹕Originally grown in Europe, now in most part of China.原產歐洲。我國各地庭園中多有栽培。 Properties(characteristics)﹕性味﹕bitter, acrid, slightly toxic.苦，辛，有小毒。Channels (meridians) entered: 歸經﹕Medical functions:藥理﹕ Alcohol extract of leaves and stems possess inhibiting effect on Bacillus cereus and bacillus mycoides.莖和葉的酒精提取液，對蠟樣芽胞桿菌 (Bacillus cereus)，和蕈狀桿菌 （bacillus mycoides）有抑制作用。Actions & Indications:主治﹕Flowers: for digestive tract yeast infection, flatulence, vomiting or burping with undigested food, abdomen pain, foul smelling breath, tongue with oily, dirty fur.Root being used as sedative. For treatment of manic depression.花：脾胃濕濁﹔胸脘滿悶﹔嘔逆腹痛﹔口臭苔膩根：為鎮靜藥。治臟躁症。Chemical ingredients:化學成份﹕Pollens contain:花粉含:n-heptacosane正-二十七烷iso-heptacosane異-二十七烷isovitexin花被含異牡荊素quercetin-3-glucoside槲皮素-3-葡萄甙quercetin-3-O-β-gentiobioside-7-O-β-glucuronide槲皮素-3-O-β-D-龍膽二糖甙-7-O-β-葡萄糖醛酸甙quercetin-3-O-β-rutinoside-7-O-β-glucuronide槲皮素-3-O-β-芸香糖甙-7-O-β-葡萄糖醛酸甙quercetin-3-O-β-glucoside-7-O-β-glucuronide槲皮素-3-O-β-葡萄糖甙-7-O-β-葡萄糖醛酸甙kaempferol-3-glucoside山柰酚-3-葡萄糖甙kaempferol-3-O-β-gentiobioside-7-O-β-glucuronide山柰酚-3-O-β-龍膽二糖甙-7-O-β-葡萄糖醛酸甙kaempferol-3-O-β-rutinoside-7-O-β-glucuronide山柰酚-3-O-β-芸香糖甙-7-O-β-葡萄糖醛酸甙kaempferol-3-O-β-glucoside-7-O-β-glucuronide山柰酚-3-O-β-葡萄糖甙-7-O-β-葡萄糖醛酸甙Flowers contain: 花含:gibberellin A5,A9,A13赤霉素A5，A9和A13salicylic acid水楊酸Root contains:根莖含:4-ethylglutamic acid4-乙基谷氨酸4-ethylideneglutamic acid4-亞乙基谷氨酸4-ethyl-4-hydroxyglutamic acid4-乙基-4-羥谷氨酸4-methylglutamic acid4-甲基谷氨酸4-methylene-glutamic acid4-亞甲基谷氨酸4-hydroxymethylglutamic acid4-羥甲基谷氨酸4-hydroxy-4-methylglutamic acid4-羥基-4-甲基谷氨酸fatty acids脂肪酸Mainly consists of:主要是:octadecadienoic acid十八碳二烯酸sterols甾醇類Mainly consists of:主要有:sitosterol谷甾醇campesterol菜油甾醇Also contains:還含有:glucose葡萄糖cane sugar蔗糖fructose果糖starch澱粉oligofructan寡果聚糖cytochrome P450細胞色素P450agglutinin凝聚素Leaves contain:葉含:tuliposide A-C郁金香甙A-C10-nonacosanol10-二十九烷醇Also contains:還含:abscisic acid methyl ester止杈酸(脫落酸)甲酯http://www.med126.com/pharm/2009/20090113050710_90411.shtmlDaly Dosage:每日用量﹕Flowers for decoction 3 to 5 g.  For external application: use appropriate amount.Root: 1.5 g to 9 g in pills or in powder form花：内服，煎湯 3～5克。外用適量。根：1.5 克～9克，入丸散。Samples of formulae:處方舉例﹕ Modern Research:現代研究﹕ Toxicity & Cautions:毒素與禁忌﹕The bulb and the flowers have been known to cause dermatitis in sensitive people, though up to 5 bulbs a day can be eaten without ill-effect. [1] It can cause diarrhea in some people if eaten too much. 鬱金香的花與球莖有一定毒性。其葉子和球莖 可能會引起一些人的皮膚出現過敏症狀。 每天食用五颗球莖一般是安全。【1】。過度服食可能引起腹瀉。[1] Frohne. D. and Pf鄚der. J. A Colour Atlas of Poisonous Plants. Maladies Treated: achy loin and knees due to liver and shenxu (kidney deficient)
rheumatoid arthritis due to liver and shenxu (kidney deficient)
Dosage: 4.5 - 9 g in decoction. 4.5 ~ 9 克 。 煎服。
Samples of Formulae:
For achy loin and knees due to liver and shenxu (kidney deficient): combine with tu xi zi, niu xi, du zhong etc.
For rheumatoid arthritis due to liver and shenxu (kidney deficient): combine with gui zhi, qin jiu, hai feng teng, niu xi etc.
Contraindications: Not to use in cases of difficulty in urination or heat from yinxu (yin deficient).
Original Text:
gou ji,Complementary and Alternative Healing University

gou ji

by: Joe Hing kwok Chu

    學名﹕

Cibotium barometz (Linn.) J. Sm.

kuch'ok




Pron. in Cantonese:

    gau2 zik3

jin mao gou ji,  金 毛 狗 脊 



Common Name:

Distribution:

Fujian, Sichuan, Yunnan, Zhejiang

(characteristics)﹕
性味﹕

bitter, sweet, warm.

kidney, liver.腎 ﹐ 肝 。

achy loin and knees due to liver and

achy loin and knees due to liver and

rheumatoid arthritis due to liver and
